name: cookie-monster
description: A Chrome extension that clears cookies and storage for specified websites when a tab is closed.

scripts.build: rm -rf  dist && npx tsc && npm run copy-static
scripts.copy-static: cpx "src/**/*.html" dist && cpx "src/**/*.css" dist && cpx manifest.json dist && cpx "icons/**/*" dist/icons
scripts.package: npm run build && web-ext build --source-dir dist --artifacts-dir release --overwrite-dest

author: Chris Bentkowski
